Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Ender::
       "Okay.  So we've got two separate groups of intruders inside and at 
least one group outside?  I wouldn't worry about the ones outside unless 
they're a serious threat to the base.  Of the two inside, I suggest pinning 
the one with the virus at a corner with bots in both halls.  The other 
group... hmm... the same tactic would work unless they're fast.  In which 
case the best place would be a long hallway.  They could get up to high 
speeds but there's no maneuverability at those speeds.  All it would take is 
a slight kick or shot and they'd lose their balance and get seriously 
injured.  So how many bots do we have to take on these intruders?"

--part1_166.37b49a1.291a04c3_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>::Ender::
<BR>       "Okay.  So we've got two separate groups of intruders inside and at least one group outside?  I wouldn't worry about the ones outside unless they're a serious threat to the base.  Of the two inside, I suggest pinning the one with the virus at a corner with bots in both halls.  The other group... hmm... the same tactic would work unless they're fast.  In which case the best place would be a long hallway.  They could get up to high speeds but there's no maneuverability at those speeds.  All it would take is a slight kick or shot and they'd lose their balance and get seriously injured.  So how many bots do we have to take on these intruders?"</FONT></HTML>

--part1_166.37b49a1.291a04c3_boundary--
